channel.title: PI problem
channel.description: ALright, this mostly has to do with like interfaces and dialogue... alright. So, let's make it a story.. you run up to the shop assistant and talk to him, he's like what would you like.. you just ignore it and run away by clicking the map to walk away.. but the problem here is.. "THE DIALOGUE IS STILL THERE" IT is suspose to dissepear but, it doesn't it's the same with all the things that pop up.. please help fix this problem "dialogue doesn't dissepear when you walk" normaly it's suspose to

item.title: PI problem
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

ALright, this mostly has to do with like interfaces and dialogue… alright.
So, let’s make it a story…
you run up to the shop assistant and talk to him, he’s like what would you like… you just ignore it and run away by clicking the map to walk away… but the problem here is… “THE DIALOGUE IS STILL THERE”
IT is suspose to dissepear but, it doesn’t it’s the same with all the things that pop up…
please help fix this problem “dialogue doesn’t dissepear when you walk” normaly it’s suspose to
